title: Skins for the coming future of Rito (GOODJOBRITOS)
body: Riot have utterly done well in the design of these skins; Elderwood Hecarim, Dragon Trainer Tristana, Gravelord Azir, the quartet of adventurers and the upcoming Snowday Skins. The design and splash art is amazing gaining its own character by just looking at it, GJ Rito. (buymeelderwoodhecaplox)
